content: hennin cat hat crochet pattern by anna lee materials finished measurement yarn yarn bee soft & sleek dk #3 weight neck opening circumference » color a pumpkin paradise 8 inches » color b oxblood skill level easy » color c dijon size 7/4 5mm crochet hook stitch markers tapestry needle abbreviations the sizing provided in this pattern is approximate depending on your gauge and yarn choices the us crochet terms finished measurement may vary you may try using fsc = foundation single_crochet a larger or smaller size hook to obtain your desired chain s = chain s measurement see additional sizing information on st s = stitch es page 4 slip_stitch = slip_stitch blo = back loop only **important note about the yarn** single_crochet = single_crochet yarn bee soft & sleek dk is labeled as #3 weight half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet however it feels more like a sport #2 weight keep double_crochet = double_crochet this in mind if you use a different yarn decrease = single_crochet 2 stitches together hdc2tog = half_double_crochet 2 stitches together pattern fpdc = front post double_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet ear cover - make two with color a and color b fphdc = front post half_double_crochet fsc 40 40 bphdc = back post half_double_crochet round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and across 40 notes round 2 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 36 sts decrease 38 this hat is worked in rounds round 3 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 34 sts decrease 36 beginning chain 1 or chain 2 does not count as a stitch round 4 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 32 sts decrease 34 first stitch of each round is worked in the same stitch as beginning chain round 5 chain 1 *decrease single_crochet in next 14 sts* 2 times decrease 31 at the end of each round slip_stitch in the first stitch from previous round to join round 6 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 27 sts decrease 29 the instructions in this pattern are for an adult size round 7 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 25 sts decrease 27 hairless cat copyright © 2022 anna lee hennin cat hat | 1 hennin cat hat | crochet pattern by anna lee round 8 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 23 sts decrease 25 sew ear covers together find the two center sts on short side of each piece round 9 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 21 sts decrease 23 place stitch marks in these sts figure 1 round 10 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 19 sts decrease 21 place a stitch marker in the 5th st from the center sts on each side figure 2 round 11 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 17 sts decrease 19 with the right sides facing together join these 12 sts round 12 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in next 15 sts decrease 17 with sl sts figure 3 round 13 chain 1 decrease single_crochet in each st across 16
